revision.comment: Add TPM device and link to OEM datasheet
revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Viptela |model=vEdge |revision=100b |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |manuf=Interface Masters |manuf_model=Niagara 818 |manuf_rev=Rev B |est_release_date=2015 |type=network security platform |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN7020 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model=M25P32V6G |fla2=4 GiB |fla2_brand=Micron |fla2_model=MTFC4GACAAAM-1M WT |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16TW-107 |ram1_num=4 |ram2=512 |ram2_brand=Micron |ram2_model=MT41K256M8DA-107 |ram2_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, J21 |serial=yes,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Vitesse |eth_chip2_model=VSC8514 |eth_chip3_brand=Vitesse |eth_chip3_model=VSC8501 |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=4 |addl_chips=GPS Module;Telit;Jupiter SE880;;1;,,, USB to Basic UART IC;FTDI;FT230X;;1;,,, I2C RTC w/SRAM;Microchip;MPC7940N;;1;,,, System Temperature Monitor;ON Semi;ADM1032;;1;,,, CPLD;Altera;EPM1270F265C5N;;1;,,, I2C TPM Device;Renesas;R5H30211;;1;,,, 4-Input 3-Ouput Clock Multiplier/Frequency Synthesizer;Microsemi;SL30251;;1;,,, 2K Serial EEPROM;STMicro;24C02WP;;1;,,, 512 Kbit serial I2C bus EEPROM;STMicro;M24512-R;;2;,,, Dual N-Channel Logic Level PWM MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6898A;;4;,,, N-Channel MOSFET Synchronous Buck Regulator Controller;National Semi;LM2743;;4;,,, 1.5A Adjustable LDO Linear Regulator;TI;LP38852-ADJ;;1;,,, 4-bit Low-Voltage FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CB3Q3257;;1;,,, Octal Buffer or Driver w/ 3-State Output;TI;SN74LVC244A;;1; |flags=GPS receiver, RTC w/ battery, heatsink, metal case |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.07; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.62;-ltsi |oui_eth=80:B7:09 }} {{TagLine|SD-WAN Router}} :[https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/routers/sdwan/vedge/hardware/vEdge-routers-hardware-installation-guide/vEdge-routers-hardware-installation-guide_chapter_010.html Installation Guide] * [https://interfacemasters.com/pdf/appliances/Niagara818-ProductBrief.pdf OEM Datasheet]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cavium]]'' CN7020 Dual-core [[MIPS64]] (@800MHz) *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 4MB SPI Flash, 4GB eMMC Flash *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports *Power: 12V, 1.5A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Viptela vEdge 100b Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Viptela vEdge 100b Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
